titleStmt.title: M. S. to A. S. with a plea for libertie of conscience in a church way against the cavils of A. S. and observations on his considerations and annotations upon the apologeticall narration, humbly submitted to the judgements of all rationall and moderate men in the world : with some modest and innocent touches on the letter from Zealand and Mr. Parker's from New-England.
titleStmt.author: Goodwin, John, 1594?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. N. for H. Overton,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Goodwin. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
